A single mother's wish to have the ability to teleport, so she can instantly travel to different places for work or to visit family and friends without having to worry about transportation or time.
A homeless person's wish to have a safe and warm place to live, with access to all the necessities of life, such as food, water, and healthcare.
A person who has been diagnosed with a terminal illness's wish to be cured and able to live a healthy and fulfilling life.
A small business owner's wish to have the ability to create products or services that can instantly change the lives of others for the better.
A person who has lost a loved one's wish to have a chance to talk to them one last time, and have them tell them how much they love and miss them.
